PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-04902003-04-08,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisReappointment of RONALD D. WILLIAMS of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designates RONALD D. WILLIAMS for the Alberta/Northwest Territories region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of that Act; and determines that RONALD D. WILLIAMS shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Alberta/Northwest Territories regional office; effective May 10, 2003.
AttachmentsAttachment
